summary.para: Gets files from a content group.

param.name: enumerator
param.para: An enumerator for getting content group files.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the name of the content group.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Retrieves information about a content group.
